    • Method Detail

      • getJwtByUsernamePassword

        public java.lang.String getJwtByUsernamePassword​(java.lang.String username,
                                                 java.lang.String rawPassword)
                                          throws org.springframework.security.authentication.BadCredentialsException,
                                                 org.springframework.security.authentication.InternalAuthenticationServiceException
        Description copied from interface: LoginService
        username과 password를 이용해 jwt를 생성한다. 이때 userdetails service를 이용해 username, password를 확인하며 불일치 및 오류 발생시 Authentication exception을 발생시킨다.
        Specified by:
        getJwtByUsernamePassword in interface LoginService
        Returns:
        jwt 문자열
        Throws:
        org.springframework.security.authentication.BadCredentialsException - - username, password등에 문제 있을시
        org.springframework.security.authentication.InternalAuthenticationServiceException - - jwt생성과정에 문제있을시
